Versija: 0.9.0.5+CVS

b2evo paketas: Pradinis puslapis · Instaliavimas · Blogai · Administracija · Online: Žinynas · Pagalba

Upgrading from WordPress

Before you begin, please note that some network features of b2evolution require you to agree our simple Terms of service.

The upgrade procedure below has been tested exclusively with WordPress version 1.2. Though it may not work with other versions, you can still give it a try quite safely. b2evolution will not harm your data, even if it can't understand it. The worst you would get is an error message.

Tačiau kaip visada, būtų protingiau, kad jūs prieš pradėdami atnaujinimą, išsaugotumėt savo svetainės duomenų bazės kopiją.

Kai tik išarchyvavote b2evolution archyvą:

  1. On your server, locate the mysql database you are already using for WordPress. You must use the same database for b2evolution to be able to upgrade. Feel safe, b2evolution will not alter your WordPress tables and data in any way!

    Pastaba Nr.1: Unless you changed the config, all tables created by b2evolution are prefixed with evo_ . Unless you already have an application using the same prefix, this makes it safe to install b2evolution in a database shared with other applications. For example, WordPress used tables prefixed with wp_ by default. Your existing tables will not be affected in any way.
    Pastaba Nr.2: Kodėl ta pati duomenų bazė? Todėl, kad mes naudojame greitą ir saugų SQL procesą duomenų kopijavimui, tačiau jis gali būti vykdomas tik vienoje duomenų bazėje.
  2. Nusiųskite b2evolution failus į savo serverį.

    Pastaba: Only the contents of the /blogs directory need to be uploaded to your site. If you want b2evolution to handle the homepage of your site, upload the contents of the /blogs folder to your website root. However, you could start by uploading the files to a new subdirectory, /b2evo for example; that way your existing WordPress blog remains fully functional while you check out b2evolution.
    tarkim, kad jūs perkelėte failus iš katalogo blogs į http://yoursite.com/b2evo ...
  3. Run the installation script on your server. It is located in http://yoursite.com/b2evo/install . Then, simply follow the on screen instructions.

    The installer will ask you a few questions, create required database tables, copy your WordPress data to b2evo (without affecting WordPress) and configure b2evolution for you.
  4. Patikrinkite, kad įsitikintumėt, jog instaliacija pavyko.
  5. Viešame serveryje (internete) rekomenduojame, kad jūs ištrintumėte /install katalogą.
  6. Check the wiki or the forums for notes on upgrading your existing WordPress template & skin to b2evolution.

    Pastaba: You can reuse your current WordPress CSS design in a snap by copying your style.css file into any b2evolution skin folder which name starts with wpc_ (which stands for WordPress CSS compatible)
  7. Po instaliacijos galbūt jūs norėtumėte, kad mes susipažindintume jus su keleto keblių klausimų sprendimais (online žinynas).
